quest.name: Gathering Moss
journal:
Maru awaits you with an appraising look.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Obtain clumps of sticky moss at the Font of Maya.
Deliver the baskets of sticky moss to Maru.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: I've been lookin' for you, Forename. I'm in need of a strong swimmer, and you look like you could keep up with a hippo in the water.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: A friend of mine just came back from Yedlihmad, bearin' a request from Kancana herself...

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: The Font of Maya is in sore need of a deep cleanin', and we─which means you─gotta help. Kancana wants the moss gatherin' along the stone walls cleared away.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: An' as you know, I don't like to see anythin' go to waste, so I'm thinkin' I might find a use for the moss. Take these baskets with you and bring back whatever you find growin' under the water's surface.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: You're lookin' as dry as a hippo bakin' under the sun. Did you manage to gather the moss?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Ah, good─I was worried you'd take one look at them waters and think better of your choices. I'll let Kancana know that the temple should be lookin' a bit more pristine.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: As luck would have it, hippos go mad for this moss. An' it don't hurt that it provides them with all the nutrients a growin' 'pot needs! Well, how about a bite?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Hahaha! I'm just kiddin'. I know you've got much more refined tastes─maybe you can indulge 'em with this bit of coin? I even know a service that offers fast, fresh grub, delivered right to you...
